name: rn

RN noun
(NURSE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] US a
registered nurse ; also used after the name of a registered nurse: An RN makes about $30 an hour in this city. Alice Brody, RN
RN noun
(NAVY)
UK abbreviation for Royal Navy: used especially after the names of officers in the British navy: Captain H. Doughty, RN
